skill.name: agent.behaviors.skills.actions.FilterWith
skill.description: For an agent to enact the decision of activating the filtration capability of a given checkpoint. While this action is activated, the checkpoint can filtrate all the crowds that interact with it, with the specified intensity.

parameter.name: intensity
parameter.description: The strenght that is used to filter crowds. The value is defined between 0 and 100. A value of '0' means "no filtration at all". A value of '100' means "totally blocked" (the crowds that interact with the checkpoint cannot go through it).

feedback.name: filtrationActionRunning
feedback.description: Sent once simulation action is running (the filtration of the checkpoint is running).
